title: Amount
description: An Amount on the Jingtum Protocol, used also for SWT in the jingtum-rest API

value.description: The quantity of the currency, denoted as a string to retain floating point precision

currency.description: The three-character code or hex string used to denote currencies

issuer.description: The Jingtum account address of the currency's issuer or gateway, or an empty string if the currency is SWT

counterparty.description: The Jingtum account address of the currency's issuer or gateway, or an empty string if the currency is SWT
